Title: Ratifies and confirms the creation of water district no. 14 of the town of Monroe; and authorizes the issuance of bonds or notes by such town to finance certain inter-fund borrowings by such water district
Summary: Ratifies and confirms the creation of water district number 14 of the town of Monroe, made up of the water system previously owned and operated by Orchard Hill Water Company and which has been owned and operated by the town of Monroe by mandate from the public service commission since 2013; authorizes the issuance of bonds or notes by such town to finance certain inter-fund borrowings by such water district.
ActClause: AN ACT to ratify and confirm the creation of water district no. 14 of the town of Monroe and to authorize the issuance of bonds or notes by the town of Monroe to finance certain inter-fund borrowings by water district no. 14 from such town's general fund
